title: Oru Maalai Lyrics Ghajini
stanzas:
oru maalai ila veyil neram
azhagaana ilayudhir kaalam

oru maalai ila veyil neram
azhagaana ilayudhir kaalam
sattru tholaivile 
aval mugam paarthen
angae tholaindhavan naane.

aval allivitta poigal
nadunaduve konjam meigal
idhazhoram siripodu
ketukonde nindren

aval nindru pesum 
oru tharunam
en vazhvil sakarai
nimidam

eerkkum visaiyai
avalidam kandene
kandene...

oru maalai...

paarthu pazhagiya 
naangu thinangalil
nadai udai baavanai
maatri vittaal

saalai munaigalil
thuritha unavugal
vaangi unnum
vaadikkai kaattivittaal

koochcham konda thendrala
ival aayul neenda minnale
unaketra aalaaga
enai maatri kondene.

avvoru maalai ....

pesum azhaginai
kaettu rasithida
pagal neram mothamaai
kaliththene

thoongu azhaginai
paarthu rasithida
iravellaam kan vizhithu
kidappene

paniyil sendraal un mugam
enmele neeraai irangum.
ho thalai saaithu
paarthaale thadumaari ponene.

sattru tholaivile 
aval mugam paarthen
angae tholaindhavan naane.

aval allivitta poigal
nadunaduve konjam meigal
idhazhoram siripodu
ketukonde nindren

aval nindru pesum 
oru tharunam
en vazhvil sakarai
nimidam

eerkkum visaiyai
avalidam kandene
kandene...

seo.title: Oru Maalai Lyrics Ghajini
seo.description: Get the complete Oru Maalai Lyrics Ghajini from Ghajini. composed by Harrish Jeyaraj and sung by Karthik. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Ghajini, Harrish Jeyaraj, Karthik, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
